DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective trial ass ability Phosphatidylserine-Omega3 improve cognitive performance elderly subject memory impairment . This study single-center , open-label 15 week duration trial ass efficacy Phosphatidylserine-Omega3 elderly subject memory impairment .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Phosphatidylserine-Omega3 Elderly Subjects With Memory Impairment
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA 1 . Ability give write informed consent 2 . Age : 90≥ year ≥65 3 . Gender : male female . 4 . Clinical Dementia Rating Scale ( CDR ) ≤ 0.5 5 . MiniMental State Examination ( MMSE ) ≥ 26 6 . Memory test performance within mean establish adult , maximum four neuropsychological subtests computerize test score 1.5 SD mean 7 . Language : Subjects must able read , write speak Hebrew . 8 . Ability perform test interview . EXCLUSION CRITERIA 1 . Evidence delirium , confusion , disturbances consciousness . 2 . Any Neurological disorder could produce cognitive deterioration . Such disorder include AD , Parkinson 's disease , stroke , intracranial hemorrhage , local brain lesion include tumor , normal pressure hydrocephalus 3 . History infective inflammatory brain disease include viral , fungal , syphilitic etiology . 4 . Head injury immediately precede cognitive deterioration . 5 . Current psychiatric diagnosis accord DSM IV criterion depression , mania , major psychiatric disorder , evidence depression determine Geriatric Depression Scale ( GDS15 ) score 5 . 6 . Current diagnosis history alcoholism drug dependence . 7 . Any medical disorder could produce cognitive deterioration include renal , respiratory , cardiac hepatic disease , diabetes mellitus , endocrine , metabolic hematological disturbance unless well control , malignancy remission two year . 8 . Use psychotropic drug drug supplement may significantly affect cognitive function month prior psychometric test . 9 . Use experimental medication within 1 month prior screen concomitant medication . 10 . History hypersensitivity allergy fish fish oil .
